comments.content:
It looks very close to some CAD Vector (monoline) fonts named **Italic, ItalicC and ItalicT** (Autodesk, 1996)

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417203131/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
